property.name: cardClass
property.label: Card CSS Class
property.description: CSS Classes for the wrapping card div

property.name: showSelection
property.label: Show Selection?
property.description: Flag to display Selection List component.

property.name: isSingleSelect
property.label: Single Selection?
property.description: Flag to enforce single instead of multiple selection.

property.name: showSearch
property.label: Show Search?
property.description: Flag to display Search Bar component.

property.name: searchHeight
property.label: Search List Height
property.description: Search list display height in px (0 : no scroll).

property.name: isSearchAuto
property.label: Set auto Search?
property.description: Flag to set Search input in automatic mode.

property.name: showSort
property.label: Show Sort?
property.description: Flag to display Sort Button Menu.

property.name: defaultSortedBy
property.label: Default Sort Field
property.description: API name of the field to be used to sort records by defaut (in asc mode).

property.name: nameField
property.label: Title Field
property.description: API name of the Name field to be used as Title to display records.

property.name: nameLabel
property.label: Title Label
property.description: Label of the Name field to be used as Title to display records.

property.name: keyField
property.label: Key Field
property.description: API name of the field to be used as unique record identifier for selection (Salesforce Id by default).

property.name: selectName
property.label: Title as default Search?
property.description: Flag to set record title fields as default search option.

property.name: fieldSetName
property.label: Detail FieldSet
property.description: Name of the fieldSet to be used to display additional info in tiles (as ObjectApiName.FieldSetName).

property.name: recordList
property.label: RecordList
property.description: List of records to choose from.
